MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the KY7 postcode area of Glenrothes is still ongoing. This is due to difficulties on site and we now expect power to be back on by 5:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:25pm on the 09th December 2020
